issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Implement parquet::FileMetaData::Equals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4970](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4970). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently it is not possible to compare FileMetaData objects.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4970?focusedCommentId=16797140) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~wesmckinn]` I'm not sure whether a parquet issue like this should go under ARROW or PARQUET project?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4970?focusedCommentId=16797377) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Move this one to PARQUET I think

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4970?focusedCommentId=17223199) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
This is fixed in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8507 by `[~bkietz]`
